attributes.action: Renew Uber's Private Hire Operators Licence
attributes.additional_details:
With TfL's decision to not renew Uber's private hire licence, around 40,000 drivers will be out of work. 

Not only, Uber has provided a service that resonates with society's shift into the technological age. 

Uber offers security, accountability and affordability to its users, and a decision to deny their licence will result in Black Cabs gaining a monopoly in London.
attributes.background: TfL has announced that they will not be renewing Uber's private hire licence.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
